it is really hard place to hitch a car. DO NOT wast your time here. After one and half hour, i hitch a car to Benesov. i get of the car on the highway, walked 4 km and find a petrol staton. then, i came back to Prague and bought a ticket to Brno. Because it was winter and the sky got dark [2011-12-22 19:16:02]

properties.description:

A goog hitching place for getting to Dresden, Berlin (much more better than that one, added by weslez). I was waiting max. 20 min.

we wait 3o to 40 min. another couple were also there. good one. you get out of the metro and then cross the field, it can be muddy :D ruso [2011-03-25 15:04:36]

good place for me also first five minutes a guy vame to us and asked where we want to go to and so we came to berlin in one lift almost a little boring :) [2011-07-18 00:59:36]

[2011-09-01 01:12:24]

[2014-07-26 14:23:10]

easy to get here, average to get away. we walked a bit further by the road. [2011-02-24 08:58:59]

properties.description:

properties.Name: ÄŒernÃ½ Most
properties.description:

This petrol station is good for hitchhiking east towards Brno and Bratislava. From metro station Opatov (red C line) take bus 324, 363 or 385 to stop K Sukovu. You'll know you're there because 150m away to your right is the service station. Keep walking along the bus route, go over the bridge and walk onto the service station. Large, with many facilities and many opportunities to ask drivers. For more info, see http://www.hitchwiki.org/Prague

it took me longer to get there than to get a ride directly to Brno:D [2013-04-06 03:32:54]

properties.Name: Hradec KrÃ¡lovÃ©

Many times leaving Prague sunday early afternoon I hoped to be home (Gliwice in PL) before midnight. 95% succeded I dislike standing at Cerny Most among other hitchers thefore I walk to the first gas station. There I ask to the Hradec K. and get off at the place I indicate here. It's a marvelous one. ALL the traffic from the highway stops here. Let us pray to the hitcher's God so that the motorway construction is to be neverending. once the motorwayis finished the place will be lost.

When you get off from the bus, go cca. 500m in the bus direction and you will see the petrol station.
girl and boy wait 5 mnutes abort78 [2013-05-02 20:07:02]

arrived here once about 1oclock at night, stood here for 5hours in the winter, not many cars/trucks came trough. hard route at night i guess
arrived on a spring evening but couldn't get away I slept in Kormorni Hradek on a tenniscourt like space in a bed of the road entering Komorni Hradek next morning got away in an hour [2014-03-20 20:08:30]

properties.Name: ÃšstÃ­ nad Labem

Actually good spot to stand on, but take care: Hard shoulder on the left side! Traffic is okay but not too much in direction Germany. Mostly locals.
stood there..i guess we just got lucky and got a ride to Dresden in less than 5 mins..there is not sooo much space for cars to stop and also they see you sort of in last second so also not much time to decide..but it's ok [2012-08-27 20:21:36]

properties.Name: DÄ›ÄÃ­n
properties.description:

This is the last gas station when heading out of town. Shuold be good for hitchiking, but we have passed it and only went by the road (62 direction - Prague)showing that we are hitchiking. A young man who works in Prague gave a lift for me and my friend.

properties.Name: Opava
properties.description:
Ocena : 2(2 głosów) | Unknown (0 głosów)
From city center go in direction to hospital (through OlomouckÃ¡ street). Stay before mad-house and find your favorite place to hitchhiking. A lot of cars are going in direction to Olomouc, but not all are going directly to the city, so you will transcend during the ride

properties.Name: FrÃ½dek-MÃ­stek
properties.description:
Ocena : 3(3 głosów) | 1h (1 głosów)
From city center go to TESCO and before the store walk along highway cca. 300m in direction to Ostrava. After big crossroad you find the petrol-station with not a lot of traffic, but all cars are going to Ostrava.

properties.Name: Brno
properties.description:
Ocena : 4(20 głosów) | 1h 59min (16 głosów)
A petrol station on the motorway south to Bratislava. Take the free Avion shopping centre bus from behind Tescos. There are two big shopping centres near to each other and both have free buses leaving regularly behind Tescos. DO NOT get on the Olympia bus. Take the Avion bus. When you arrive at the shopping centre you will see the OMV petrol station nearby on the same side of the motorway.
yes, this is a best place to go to bratislava, because you cann take a free caffee in ikea :), but you stay long time in petrol station. [2011-06-25 15:28:04]
if there is many locals, just go and ask truck drivers or normal drivers with slovak plates [2011-08-31 15:48:03]
4 of us hitchhikers were waiting here to get ride in Bratislava direction, many cars went back to Brno, but probably still the best place for Brno-Bratislava [2012-07-07 19:34:19]
You must ask drivers at the parking. Bratislava or GyÅ‘r is no problem... [2013-07-26 17:01:46]
We hitchhiked easily to Budapest, but place is on the round-about, a little bit closer to the exit from petrol station. Good to have sign with name of the city. [2013-08-03 09:26:16]
We were dropped of here and catch easy ride to Bratislava (asking drivers at the gas station). Really good place. There are also many trucks heading further directions. [2013-08-12 11:58:47]
Maybe its a good idea to try different options. ask the drivers here and in the parking or go to the runabout with a sign if there are no many people stopped here. [2013-12-19 20:28:53]
The best thing with the BRATISLAVA sign is that you dont even have to make an own table, there is the green one upperside:) just take it to your hands as it would be yours (tall people has advantage though) [2014-08-06 21:32:18]

properties.Name: Å ternberk
properties.description:

From town center go through street OlomouckÃ¡ and stay before some factory. Good for hitchhiking on 2pm, when all people from factory are going home. There is a lot of car, but not a really good spot to stay. You must stay at roadside.

properties.Name: ProstÄ›jov
properties.description:
Ocena : 4(3 głosów) | 10min (1 głosów)
From town center go through street DolnÃ­ to the highway approach ProstÄ›jov - stÅ™ed (or ask people how to go to Kralice), on the crossroad before higway turn left, go up the railway and down the highway. On the roundabout go straight and on first crossroad turn left. Good hitchplace mostly in working days because there going a lot of cars from industrial zone.

properties.Name: Praha
properties.description:
Ocena : 3(5 głosów) | 25min (2 głosów)
Quite good for direction Plzen, Germany. Take a tram to 'Motol'.
Risky place to stop, high traffic [2011-01-16 08:44:49]
good spot I waited 10 seconds to find a lift to Strasbourg [2012-06-13 00:43:08]

properties.Name: Pardubice
properties.description:
Ocena : 3(2 głosów) | Unknown (0 głosów)
for directions Brno, Ostrava, Olomouc..., Sezemice, Holice, OrlickÃ© hory...use the bus nr.5,13

properties.Name: Tanvald
properties.description:
Ocena : 4(5 głosów) | 5h 29min (6 głosów)
It's a very good place to hitchhike. Although officially there is no border between the Czech Republic and Poland cars still have to stop. It's a great time to ask for a ride. Many of the drivers go to Prague
This place is useless to go somewhere far in Czech Republic, all you can get is to go to Harrachov. Standing there with sign "Praha" is senseless. Traffic is really small for the border, I've tried this place only once, but I stood there several hours, sometimes it was 10 cars per hour on the way to Czech. No cars have to stop here anymore, I was really frustrated when I was hitchhiking there, so please listen to my advice and don't waste your time there, if you are going to Prague, better take a walk to the green point highlighted in Harrachov (it's something like 3km), traffic there is much bigger. On the other hand, this border is great to go to Jelenia GÃ³ra, you will get your ride really fast. To sum up - to go to Jelenia GÃ³ra I stood there less than 5 minutes, to go to Praha I stood there 6 hours and gave up. [2015-09-04 12:08:33]

properties.Name: Pardubice
properties.description:
Ocena : 6(1 głosów) | Unknown (0 głosów)
direction Hradec KrÃ¡lovÃ©

properties.Name: Ostrava
properties.description:
Ocena : 3(2 głosów) | Unknown (0 głosów)
From citycenter take tram 7,8,9 or 17. Get out on station 17. listopadu and continue in ORIGINAL tram direction throught street OpavskÃ¡ cca. 1 km till you reach bus station. Almost all cars are going to Opava.

properties.Name: Letovice
properties.description:
Ocena : 4(3 głosów) | 20min (2 głosów)
Next good place for hitchhiking direction to Svitavy, Pardubice, Hradec Kralove or Sumperk and Jesenik near gas station (shop,pub). You can ask drivers at gas station too.

properties.Name: ProstÄ›jov
properties.description:
Ocena : 3(3 głosów) | 1h 20min (2 głosów)
Place near rounabout junction (west) and gas station (east), direction East, dense traffic but many strange drivers which often ends in any small villages in the woods, better to use sign - Boskovice, Nove Mesto na Morave, Zdar nad Sazavou. Waiting there can be often longer than hour.

properties.Name: Brno
properties.description:
Ocena : 3(20 głosów) | 2h 21min (16 głosów)
Much better as the petrol station because you can catch the traffic from the shopping centre as well!
I stand here with sign to Bratislava. 15 minutes later I was talking with great musician in his car on highway. [2011-06-08 16:29:05]

go to the petrol station [2011-06-25 15:30:19]
If going to Bratislava you better ask Slovakian plates and trucks at the gas station because it's hard to safely pull-off on the runabout and most people go back to Brno or the surroundings because they were here shopping. [2012-03-12 20:15:14]
I was going to Budapest and despite the lots of local cars I got picked up almost until the border :) [2013-09-27 01:42:48]
2 hours waiting and the night fell [2013-11-11 20:35:37]
Definitely a good idea to have a sign here. Traffic using this slip-road are not going back to Brno (they use the other slip-road), but most are from the local area south of Brno. However, it is definitely possible to get a long lift to at least Bratislava... and there is enough place for cars to pull over safely. [2013-11-22 20:42:08]
I tried different places in this shopping park. I stood next to the Bratislava sing. Here its a bit difficult cause there is no space enough to stop the car without being an obstacle for the traffic. Good spot, place to pull over, driver are going slowly. 10-15mins until cool guys picked us up to Bratislava :)) [2016-08-15 13:49:30]

Very good place, direction to Svitavy, Hradec Kralove or Pardubice and Sumperk and Jesenik too. Wide road and enough place to stop for drivers. Sometimes there can be parking cars near this place. Small pub across the road on the north.

properties.description:

I think good spot to hitchhike to Vienna. At least I did it. Take tram 2 and go to stop ModÅ™ice, TyrÅ¡ova. There is gas station or little futher also place for cars to stop.
The best way to HH south from Brno. DonÂ´t forget the SIGN... [2011-05-25 10:13:32]

Walked a bit south from the Unicorn(?) station, got a ride to Vienna it 15 mins :) [2013-04-20 20:26:55]

properties.Name: LipÅ¯vka
properties.description:

Good place near bus station, direction Svitavy, Hradec Kralove, Pardubice, Sumperk or Jesenik. Dense traffic and 50km/h speed limit - waiting was never longer than 1 hour. Some pubs and shops in village around.

properties.Name: Karlova StudÃ¡nka
properties.description:
Ocena : 4(2 głosów) | 30min (1 głosów)
Good place near pub, motel, parking place and bus stop towards Sumperk, Mohelnice, Olomouc, Svitavy, but better to use sign. A lot of friendly drivers, especially during summer holidays. But in this time there is a lot of moving pedestrians and bikers on the roadside.

properties.Name: ProstÄ›jov
properties.description:
Ocena : 2(4 głosów) | 2h 53min (2 głosów)
Not so good place direction east to Prerov, Kromeriz, Zlin. Some old gas station about 600 meters south-west. Many drivers riding old cars ends in near small villages so better to use sign. Waiting can be longer than hour.

properties.Name: Praha
properties.description:
Ocena : 3(4 głosów) | 50min (2 głosów)
If you're lazy walking long ways till you reach the hitchspot, you should try option three: * Take Metro C till Chodov * leaving the metro entry turn right into road Roztylska until you reach the roundabout * the 2nd exit of the roundabout is yours, then again turn the first right into road Kloknetova * walk straight through the path in the bush, cross the street, enter the gas station and hitch a ride =) The gas-station is a smaller one right on the motorway, but even if you won't find a long-distance ride in the first 10 minutes you can ask drivers to bring you to the next gas-stations which is 10 minutes away by car.at this bigger gas station lots of people stop to refill and are going direction Brno, Vienna and Ceske Budejovice Budweis. On the Viva con Agua Hitchhike Race in 2009 one team chose that spot and it worked our pretty good!
People were friendly enough, though not a lot were going south as I was. Mostly not out of the city at all. As said above however it's quite possible to get a ride to the next gasstation. [2012-07-24 18:33:15]

properties.Name: BystÅ™ice nad PernÅ¡tejnem
properties.description:
Ocena : 4(1 głosów) | Unknown (0 głosów)
Good place near gas station towards Nove Mesto na Morave and Zdar nad Sazavou. Traffic density could be better but waiting wasn't longer than half an hour.

properties.Name: Praha
properties.description:
Ocena : 3(2 głosów) | 23min (2 głosów)
* Take Metro C till Chodov * leaving the metro entry turn right into road Roztylska until you reach the roundabout * the 2nd exit of the roundabout is yours, then again turn the first right into road Kloknetova * walk straight through the path in the bush, cross the street, enter the gas station and hitch a ride =)
I just asked few people and one guy take me to D1 [2016-09-16 20:10:57]

properties.Name: Brno
properties.description:
Ocena : 4(19 głosów) | 56min (17 głosów)
good to HH to Prague, Pilsen, Germany. YouÂ´ll be seen from far distance. Get there with tram 5 or 8 to the endstation
its not the endstation of 5...but 6 [2011-04-03 18:56:40]
smÄ›r praha? lepÅ¡Ã­ jÃ­t na benzinku (2.5km na "ÄerstvÃ©m" vzduchu) [2011-06-25 14:51:10]

waited 1 hour, noone stopped, but then were takengot a ride to Prague [2013-01-25 02:25:17]
too risky when busy, drivers stop only on quiet sundays, no chance in peak time, petrol station from Osova down south is the best place (been HHking to/from Brno for ages) and even sometimes you get lucky, this place is f$% up [2013-09-12 12:53:27]

properties.Name: Mikulov
properties.description:
Ocena : 4(18 głosów) | 1h 54min (14 głosów)
at this spot there is a gasstation at which you can ask drivers going northbound ('brno' directed) or southbound ('vienna' directed). the federal highway here has an asphalted shoulder which makes it easy (meaning: safe) to stand on and for drivers easy to stop. if there is cars stopping at the gasstation you can jump back and forth between the pumps and the road (10 to 20 meters). although i have rated this spot 'good' it took me on december 25th 2009 (first day of christmas) almost two hours to find someone going to vienna (positive: after the long waiting time the tour was nonstop then to the center of vienna). on my personal rating from '1' (very- very poor) to '10' (excellent) this spot receives an '8 to 9' as it is safe and easy to find.
20 minutes and I had a ride to Vienna. [2012-07-19 00:59:45]
Very good spot to catch some lorry going south, or north. Just ask a drivers, I did use this spot 11 times so far and never been there more than 45 minutes. I even have a non-stop ride to north Italy!! [2012-12-16 17:49:12]
I was here during the Easter night willing to get to Wien - stuck for 13 hours, between 20h and 09h. After a sleepless night in this Agip tankstelle, experiencing cold temperatures and heavy blowing snow, to get out of the situation I went on foot towards Wien along the E461 and finally got a ride. I would say that this spot during normal days most of the time of the year is okay, but during festivities this is a criminal place. [2013-04-04 10:43:21]
I htichiked from here to Budapest with my sister. Saturday morning, 9 o clock. It took us 22 minutes to get a ride to Wien. Excellent place! [2014-10-18 23:29:47]
23 minutes an I had a ride to Vienna. (sat 11.7. around 4pm) [2015-07-13 12:19:16]
National holiday, I waited here around 10 minutes than a truck driver who was going to Italy stopped but took me only to the border, because he had to make a pause and I was going to Germany. Anyway at the border a polish guy who just brought another hitchhiker there took me to Wien, the spot is great [2016-07-19 14:51:34]

properties.Name: Brno
properties.description:
Ocena : 3(3 głosów) | 2h (1 głosów)
i hitchhiked from here to 'vienna' (via 'mikulov' close to the czech-austrian border) on the federal highway 'D52'. this road leads directly into the highway. although it was december 25th (2009) and there were almost no cars on the road in the morning it only took me 1 (in words: one) minute to find a driver. there is a gasstation 50 meters down the road as well as a second gasstation some 200 meters down the road (direction south). there is supermarkets & mc. donalds in the area, you will not starve. depending on the amount of cars you can choose here from hitchhiking from the traffic light (what i did back then on dec. 25th, there were absolutely no cars on this morning at the pumps of any of the two stations) or the stations themselves. it is obvious that drivers taking this road want to go south. also, you could use this spot to leave 'brno' first and try out better spots further south. there is around 5 to 8 gasstations between 'brno' and 'mikulov' on highway 'D52'.

properties.Name: Liberec
properties.description:
Ocena : 5(3 głosów) | 16min (4 głosów)
On the bridge by gas station. The Best Place for hitch direction to Prague or SE to Hradec.

properties.Name: Praha
properties.description:
Ocena : 3(3 głosów) | 21min (2 głosów)
i tried out this spot in december 2009 (a monday morning). i wanted to travel from here to 'brno' (moravia) on autobahn number '1'. i could not find anyone, i had to leave the spot after a waiting time of over two hours. there were several friendly drivers that told me the same over and over again: "i am only driving to my office around the corner, you should try the mc. donalds further down on autobahn number 1". this is what i did. i can only rate this spot 'average' although it is safe and people were friendly. to reach the mc. donalds i was walking six kilometers via the footbridge (seen on this image right of the station), 'turkova street', 'chilska street', 'formanka street' to the town of 'ujezd'. from there you can see the mc. donalds 'M'. from this other spot (what drivers recommended to me) it took five minutes to find a driver to 'brno'. there is also a bus going there. use the metrostation CHODOV (line C) to get to OPATOV (one stop), ask how to get to the town 'ujezd', walk the last 500 meters.

properties.Name: Kaplice
properties.description:
Ocena : 3(2 głosów) | 33min (3 głosów)
Quite a good place for HH in direction of Ceske Budejovice and Prague at the border with Austria. Drivers can really safety stop there at a small parking place in front of an exchange office. You can wait longer during the summer because of full cars with families getting back from summer holidays. You can also meet some strange people and prostitutes there - many nightclubs are located at the border.

properties.Name: Turnov
properties.description:
Ocena : 5(2 głosów) | 5min (2 głosów)
It's on the left side of the road but it is really nice and speed spot to stop somebody towards Prague.

properties.Name: ÄŒernÃ½ Most
properties.description:
Ocena : 5(30 głosów) | 29min (24 głosów)
the 'praha D1 mc. donalds restaurant'; this is one of the most perfect spots for hitchhiking i have ever seen. i is safe, quick, even though not so easy to reach from praha with the public transportation system. at this place you can choose from many drivers to take you with. i was only going to 'brno' but 'bratislava' or 'vienna' (nonstop) should be possible too. stand on the parking lot or ask at the restaurant's door. a place definitly worth taking a long-long detour from the center of the city.
I was here around 10 o'clock in the evening, and it took me about an hour to get a ride to Bratislava. Most cars were Czech, and I was looking for a ride to atleast Slovakia, but definately a good spot, had nice traffic even at this hour. [2011-12-17 18:22:00]
There is nothing to say. It's perfect spot towards Brno, Bratislava or Vienna. Just ask drivers in front of the door. Good luck! [2012-09-20 17:24:59]
i was here 24.9 morning from 11:45 til 12:15, sign to brno, but i was going to slovakia ( [2012-09-25 22:52:32]
at 7p.m. direct to brno after half hour:) i think if i come early its better ..but no problem :) [2013-05-02 19:40:17]
Got a ride to brno within 20 minutes. One of the best spots [2014-05-03 22:56:24]
very good spot towards Brno. Just be friendly and you will quickly get a ride ! [2015-07-19 11:07:34]
five minutes for a car to Brno [2015-08-27 09:37:16]

properties.Name: Brno
properties.description:
Ocena : 3(9 głosów) | 24min (6 głosów)
i have never hitchhiked from this place but it seems to be very good to me. the marker shows a gasstation next to the divided four lane federal highway that leads into the autobahn to bratislava (and furtheron to vienna or budapest). when i took a closer look at this spot there were many cars at the pumps so it should not be a problem to find drivers. the gasstation is surrounded by supermarkets so you will not starve in case you have not brought anything to eat. there is an ALDI market some hundred meters in the direcion of brno. to walk from brno to here it takes around 30 minutes. there is a paved way along the river a few hundred meters west of the gasstation. it should also be possible to use this spot to get on the brno - praha autobahn.
warning! most of the cars is going just to the suburbs or the big shopping centres around, it was nearly impossible for me to get a lift at least to the closest gas station on the highway! [2011-01-11 11:17:19]
I don't agree with Bart and guess, that this is the best spot to go to Breclav, Bratislava, Budapest. [2014-03-26 19:37:09]
me and my friend (both guys) were here HHing here to Prague, stayed here about 90 mins and then rather took a tram to the other end of Brno. I agree many cars are going only to suburbs, but we met here two another guys going to Budapest, and after some time they were gone, so probably it is not such a bad spot ;) [2015-04-04 21:28:05]

properties.Name: Jitkov
properties.description:
Ocena : 3(2 głosów) | 15min (1 głosów)
Safety spot for hitch-hiking towards "Havlickuv Brod" and highway D1.

properties.Name: Horosedly
properties.description:
Ocena : 5(2 głosów) | 3min (2 głosów)
Very good and safety spot for HH towards Pribram and Prague. We were waiting there in 3 people for 5 minutes!
A lot of space to stop. Mostly all cars are going to Prague. Traffic speed is quite high, so just write a big "P". [2012-11-25 22:54:12]

properties.Name: PlzeÅˆ
properties.description:
Ocena : 4(5 głosów) | 21min (4 głosów)
Long bus stop, cars go slowly. Most people end in PÅ™eÅ¡tice or Klatovy. You will get there by tram 4 (end station Bory).
With new piece of road this spot is worse and worse. [2013-07-09 21:50:14]
Really bad here now, go to the new spot [2013-12-03 00:50:40]
Before slip road to the motorway was built, good chances were there, but now only for exit city and theres better way to do this (try to get in Sulkov or by train to DobÅ™any zastÃ¡vka and then gas station) [2015-07-11 12:21:07]

properties.Name: Brno
properties.description:
Ocena : 4(48 głosów) | 51min (37 głosów)
Gas station, the best way to go to Praha. You have to go by tram to last stop Ustredni Hrbitov, then go by the highway about 1,5 km. Lot of cars, all are going to Praha, but always several hitchhikers waiting
It's 3km from tram station to the gas station on bad terrain near the highway, no foodpath. I was there on the evening, on the gas station were almost no cars and most didn't go to Prague. Been waiting there for more then hour and had to go back.. again half an hour by walking next to hw. I suggest some better place, this sucks [2011-04-17 05:04:05]
ItÂ´s the best legal place to HH on D1 from Brno to the west. Just go by tram 6 or 8 to the stop OsovÃ¡, then take bus Nr. 69 to the stop ÄŒermÃ¡kova, cross the street EliÅ¡ky PÅ™emyslovny and go up the street ÄŒermÃ¡kova. You cross the railway and then just before the D1 hike the slope on the left side. You have to walk about 100 m along the highway to reach this OMV gas station. I wait here regulary during a day about 15-30 min with a SIGN... [2011-05-25 10:07:19]
We got an lift by the first person we asked for direct to Prague. It is easy to find if you get on the highwaz where the Martina Sevicka (street) is crossing the highway. You have to get up a little hill to the highway and there is kind a gate in the noice protection wall. Have a good HH [2011-07-14 12:41:44]
For us it was a bit tricki, we climbed up, from an apple field, but it was easy to get very close by trams and bus. we started hiking at 12, and after 25-30 minutes we got 2 rides at the same time till praga. one would take us to berlin, but we switched directions at praha, and went west. [2012-08-16 22:55:42]
we were waiting for some time, maybe also because of the weather (rain), but then we got a ride to Praha. also quite difficult to get there, we went through the orchard and a really steep hill, maybe there's a better way [2012-09-16 21:24:21]
Got here with our last ride from Poland and had to wait an hour and half with about 10 declines from people "not going to Prauge" or "don't speak English". eventually we got a ride, but not easy. [2012-09-17 13:24:14]
15 minutes waiting for a lift to Dresden, 20.05.13 13.00 [2013-05-23 00:44:12]
first guy we asked took us to Prag in his Audi :) Wed. 3.7.13 at 11:30 have been lucky here before in October 2012, when I didn't even get a chance to go to the restroom yet but WAS asked Â»are you a hitchhiker?Â«! - that guy took me 815km to Bremen (I drove half the way)! [2013-07-04 17:02:34]

Got dropped off here on our way to Dresden. On a Wednesday at 1pm. Few cars, all of them local traffic or directions: Hradec K. or Liberec. Someone said the street that goes to Germany turns off in a few hundert meters and there would be a gas station, which our map also said, so after 33min we started walking there. It is possible without climbing or goin through dense plants or crossing dangerous roads but the Gas station was not really good: they were painting/maintaining = no cars. (July 2013) We started thumbing on the bus stops where people had space to stop but it took 45min till we got a lift. That time to Dresden (got picked up here: 50.086191,14.537843 ). âˆ‘ this Spot isn't bad for heading east. but rather bad for heading north.

I got lucky twice because drivers always took me to this one 49.161095,16.571971 . But they both drove about 6km detour to get there and 11km to get back on their way. If people don't have time and are not willing to drive you out of their way: get off here! If you miss it it'll be a ~5km walk to get to the next good spot (see coordinates above). It is an agip gas station + parking lot.

Very good place to HH as cars that go to Poland slow down before joining the highway, plus there is a pocket on the road where drivers can stop safely and easily. Take metro until last station Cerny Most and walk 10 min to this spot (close to huge shopping mall Cerny Most Centrum).
